jobDescription: We are seeking experienced, dependable and hard-working Maintenance Technicians with previous apartment maintenance experience to join our team. Our maintenance technicians are responsible for completing maintenance requests by diagnosing issues and making repairs in a timely and professional manner.Does your resume possess these skills?•General maintenance of currently occupied apartments•Timely ability to make units ready for move-in•Repair/replacement of all household appliances•Minor carpentry and plumbing•Basic drywall and painting•Heating and cooling repairs/replacementsPosition requirements:•Availability for rotation of after-hours emergency maintenance calls (offering a weekly on call bonus)•2 - 5 years of technical, vocational or on-the-job training in the following areas: HVAC, electrical, mechanical, painting, plumbing, and carpentry.•Self starter with the ability to work independently•Attention to detail and quality•Must have own toolsBy becoming part of our team you will be able to take advantage of our employee health/dental/vision benefits with a minimal waiting period for enrollment, 401(k), Maintenance Technician training program and uniform program. All candidates must pass pre-employment background, drug screen, physical and have a valid driver's license and own transportation.
